name: Pro Hunting Drak Beat 3D
description:
Pro Hunting Drak Beat 3D - You are a killer sniper acting as 3D assassin and big game hunting is your ball game. Be skillful against bears in a first person shooter (FPS) battle. While firing gunshot, you as a sniper hunter have to survive their deadly attack to enable more shooting at the army of bears.
Features:
•Thick 3D Forest, Open to explore!
•3D Animated African Animals
•Choose from among six different weapon types
•Binoculars to locate far away animals
•Realistic sound and graphics effects
